description:
test_shell: use WebDeviceOrientationClientMock::create().

Don't use the constructor directly, as it causes link errors for the multi-dll
build. This relies on WebKit having rolled to r67378.

BUG=none
TEST=Chromium XP (dbg shared) compiles successfully

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=59354

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/3311027/diff/1/2
File webkit/tools/test_shell/test_shell.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3311027/diff/1/2#newcode777
webkit/tools/test_shell/test_shell.cc:777: WebKit::WebDeviceOrientationClientMock::create());
add a using up above and ditch the WebKit::'s

subject: test_shell: use WebDeviceOrientationClientMock::create().
